description: go/scanner: Consistency, rename err to eh.

messages.text:
adg suggested to rename "eh" to "errh". I'm fine with this as long as it is a
consistent change. Which name is preferable?
ref: https://codereview.appspot.com/7029056#msg7

If "errh" is chosen then the following locations should be updated aswell:
go/scanner/scanner_test.go:225
go/scanner/scanner_test.go:596
go/scanner/scanner_test.go:637
go/parser/parser.go:71
ref: https://codereview.appspot.com/7029056#msg6

(Apologies for having been out of the loop for a while - I am recovering from a bad cold/flu.)

Please abandon this CL. This is a gratuitous change to internals and there's no need for this churn. Thanks.
- gri

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

subject: code review 7062048: go/scanner: Consistency, rename err to eh.
